objects.text:
• Classic Retro-Styled Design
• 16.3MP APS-C X-Trans Sensor
• Fast & Accurate Autofocus
• Extensive Lens Compatibility

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera design
• High-quality interchangeable lens system with bright XF lens mount
• Advanced manual control dials for precise shooting settings
• 16.3MP APS-C X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• Fast and accurate autofocus system
• Built-in electronic viewfinder (EVF)
• Tilting 3-inch LCD screen for flexible shooting angles
• Full HD 1080p video recording capability
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy sharing
• Compatible with wide range of Fujinon X-mount lenses
• Compact and lightweight body perfect for travel photography
• Film simulation modes for creative expression

banner_details:
This banner features a modern grid-based layout divided into four quadrants with distinct background shades, each supporting its own focal content area. The top left showcases a bold, impactful headline (`heading`) supported by a sleek subheading (`subheading`) and an attention-grabbing promotional tag (`tagline`). A subtle circle graphic behind lends visual depth. The top right quadrant is dominated by a high-resolution camera image (`product_image`) that reinforces the subject of the promotion. The bottom left communicates value with a clear price (`price`), original cost (`regular_price`), and key selling features (`features`). The bottom right generates urgency with a time-sensitive message (`urgency`) and a prominent call-to-action button (`cta_button`, `cta`). Grid lines and minimal circular graphics add a futuristic tech feel.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black: `#000000`
- Charcoal Gray: `#1A1A1A`, `#2A2A2A`, `#232323`
- Crimson Red: `#D71920`
- Pure White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image of the Fujifilm X-T10 camera presents a sleek, professional aesthetic dominated by a rich matte black finish (Hex #1C1C1C), enhanced with metallic reflections and gloss tones (Hex #2F2F2F and #4B4B4B). White text and markings (Hex #FFFFFF) sharply contrast the body, making branding and controls highly visible. Subtle accents, such as the red "f/2.8" and orange indicator mark (Hex #FF4500), add a pop of color that guides the viewer’s attention. The lens glass showcases greenish-yellow tints (Hex #C9D63D and #D4D2A5), suggesting premium optics. For an advertisement banner, a palette of deep charcoal, metallic gray, white, and accent orange will maintain the product's refined, high-performance feel.
